body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Water-Resistant Longer Length Cocoon Puffer Coat
features: REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.

WATER-RESISTANT TAFFETA: Plain weave shell fabric in 100% Nylon for solid colors and 100% Polyester for prints and neon colors. Fully lined, quilted and insulated. Designed to keep you extra protected for the coldest winter days

COLD-WEATHER STYLING: This long length puffer coat is the ultimate winter essential bringing comfort and warmth to your everyday. With a gentle cocoon shape, this coat is as warm as it is stylish. Accessorize your look with Amazon Essential's Scarves and Beanies.
DETAILS: Features a durable hidden snap front placket, interior zipper chest pocket, stand collar with 2 exposed snaps, and sherpa-lined front pockets to keep your hands warm.

Features a 2-Way Zipper: To close, pull down the upper slider until it touches the bottom slider. Insert the separable pin to the very bottom of the bottom slider (incomplete insertion may cause issues). Pull up the upper slider with the left hand. To open, pull down the top slider until it touches the bottom slider. Pull out the separable pin with the right hand.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,861 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #43 in Women's Down Jackets & Parkas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Jacket for Price
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is THE BEST. I didn't have much expectations but this exceed any expectations I did have. It fits a little large (and isn't greatly flattering) but honestly, id rather be comfortable, warm and dry. The only downfall / Complaint i have is that there is no hood.I am from Massachusetts and recently took a weekend trip to nantucket for an event. Day 1 was fine and the jacket was great. Light weight but warm. 2nd Day - absolute down pour day and to make matters worse we had to take the ferry home and it was PACKED due to The upper outside deck being exposed to the weather.I get sea sick and with everything inside being so crammed (sitting on bags in the hallway of the ferry and stairs) I made the choice to sit outside.... let me tell you. This Jacket kept me warm and dry for the 2.5 hour ferry ride in the rain.... (i had a hat for my head) but other than that, warm and dry!!BEST jacket for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks more expensive than it is.
reviews.reviewText: This coat is pretty and warm. It looks more expensive than it is. It's a staple for my winter wardrobe. The length is great on windy days. I wear this to outdoor sporting events and it really keeps me warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puffy and wonderful
reviews.reviewText: It's long, puffy, and warm! It's great quality and fits amazingly well. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this! The pink is fun!
reviews.reviewText: Nice and warm. Comfy to wear to take the dog out for her ball throwing first thing in the cold mornings. Zipper a bit of a pain. But, nice it can go right over the PJ’s. Feels sturdy and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Coat Ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is my absolute favorite coat. It’s stylish, super warm and has better features than some of my high end coats. The pockets are lined with a soft fuzzy material that eliminates the need for gloves. There is a large zipper pocket inside that can hold a wallet or phone. It’s long and is past my knees so it keeps me super warm. I love this coat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing Is Off
reviews.reviewText: They suggested I buy a Medium, but I like my jackets looser so I bought a Large, which is tight !!! The jacket is warm, and the right color, and since it costs more to return it than I paid for it, I will just have to live with it being snug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is really a perfect jacket. It’s long with deep pockets. The jacket looks heavy but it’s not so heavy and keeps you warm! This is a must buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I'm sure it would be warm. But would I go out of the house with it on to test it out? Ha. If I wanted to give my neighbors a laugh! It looks nothing like the picture. I died laughing at myself when I put it on. I looked like a stuffed gray roly-poly! A tube of stuffing. A sleeping bag. Absolutely no shape to it. It flared out right under the pockets to make it even more unflattering. I can't remember the size I bought. I'm normally a L/XL but I think, per the reviews, I sized down to a medium. It was just so bad on me. But all that to say, if looking gray and shapeless fills you with joy, then by all means this is the winter coat for you! I can't vouch for the warmth since I never went outside with it on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Calientito y gran calidad en la tela
reviews.reviewText: Gran calidad y súper abrigadora, tuve que devolverlo porque me quedó muy grande la talla que pedí
I’m 5’2” and 120lbs, I bought the xs, and it fits perfectly! Zipper was good, buttons didn’t feel cheap. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Puffy Insulated Coat has Many Purposes
reviews.reviewText: Just received this coat and it seems pretty substantial for keeping the winter wind and temperatures away from you. Particularly if you want to wear a hat with it. The zipper is fine; the insulation is puffy. Two outer pockets seem to be fleece-lined. You could go for a walk, sit somewhere awhile and this coat would be fine. I particularly noticed that the top shoulder seams are reinforced with tape or under-stitching which will help keep the shape of such a big puffy coat.
Mon amie adore, taille parfaitement, et qualité bonne.

Hab zwar überlegt, ob ich die Jacke behalten soll - aufgrund der Länge - aber die Leichtigkeit und die tolle Farbe haben mich überzeugt :)Sie hält schön warm, selbst im Winter (meines Erachtens keine Übergangsjacke, die man nur im Herbst tragen kann) und das bei frostigen Temperaturen.
